docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court takes up a major abortion case on Wednesday focusing on whether a Texas law that imposes strict regulations on abortion doctors and clinic buildings interferes with the constitutional right of a woman to end her pregnancy.

headline.main: Texas Abortion Case Goes Before Shorthanded U.S. Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: Texas Abortion Case Goes Before Shorthanded U.S. Supreme Court

docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court takes up a major abortion case on Wednesday focusing on whether a Texas law that imposes strict regulations on abortion doctors and clinic buildings interferes with the constitutional right of a woman to end her pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: A planned divorce, an eating disorder, a thief and a gay teenager all under one Irish-Catholic roof in Chicago, in this new ABC series.

headline.main: Review: A Family Full of Secrets in ‘The Real O’Neals’

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court's key rulings on abortion, dating to the landmark 1973 decision that legalized the procedure nationwide, have long provoked social, religious and political tensions.

headline.main: Factbox: Major U.S. Supreme Court Rulings on Abortion Rights
